tool_description:
Introducing EasyTransform API – Your Ultimate Unit Converter / Transformation Solution!

Unlock the power of seamless unit conversions / transformation with EasyTransform API! This cutting-edge tool empowers developers to effortlessly transform / convert diverse units across domains, from weight and length to time and temperature. Say goodbye to complex calculations and welcome a user-friendly interface that streamlines conversions in just a snap! Whether it's metric to imperial or vice versa...
name: EasyTransform API
title: EasyTransform API

api_list.name: Transform Units [GET]
api_list.description: The same as the POST version, but with a GET
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://easytransform-api1.p.rapidapi.com/transform/17/celsius/kelvin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easytransform-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://easytransform-api1.p.rapidapi.com/transform/{value}/{src}/{dest}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easytransform-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Specific Categorie Unit
api_list.description: Gets, with the proper categorie subclassification, all possible transformations. It's like get all but more specific
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://easytransform-api1.p.rapidapi.com/get-categorie/Data"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easytransform-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://easytransform-api1.p.rapidapi.com/get-categorie/{categorie}"

api_list.name: Get All Units Categories and Transformations
api_list.description: Get all usable units with her respective categorie
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://easytransform-api1.p.rapidapi.com/get-all-categories/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easytransform-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
